item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 4, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

22. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
23. Minimum Viable Blog (305 points | 152 comments)

25. Understanding-j: An introduction to the J programming language that gets to the (41 points | 6 comments)
26. Buffett to step down following six-decade run atop Berkshire (334 points | 256 comments)
27. Creating the Commodore 64: The Engineers' Story (53 points | 5 comments)
28. The US has approved CRISPR pigs for food (83 points | 108 comments)
29. Any headline that ends in a question mark can be answered by the word no (8 points | 3 comments)
